鸗字的基本解释

鸗
lóng
野鸭。
姓。

鸗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóng］
［《廣韻》力鍾切，平鍾，來。］
［《廣韻》盧紅切，平東，來。］
(1)野鸟；小鸟。
(2)姓。五代时有鸗脱。见《旧五代史·周书·太祖纪一》。

鸗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸗； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1504第20
【廣韻】【集韻】?力鍾切，音龍。小鳥。【廣雅】鴨也。【史記·楚世家】鄒費郯邳者，羅鸗也。【徐廣曰】野鳥也。又【廣韻】盧紅切。【集韻】盧東切【正韻】力童切，?音籠。鳧屬。又【集韻】盧動切，小?也。又【韻會】魯孔切，音籠。義同。

鸗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鸗字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ei
lóng
wild duck.
name.
Ei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lóng］
["Guangyun" force the clock to cut, Pingzhong, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Hongqie, Pingdong, come. ]
(1) Wild birds; small birds.
(2) Last name. In the Five Dynasties there was Eluto. See "Old Five Dynasties History · Zhou Shu · Taizu Ji Yi".
Ei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸗; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 1504 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Li Zhongqie, sound dragon. Little bird. [Guang Ya] Ya Ya. [Historical Records·Chu Family] Zou Fei Tan Pi, Luo Yuan Ye. [Xu Guangyue] Wild birds too. [Guang Yun] Lu Hongqie again. [Ji Yun] Lu Dongqie [Zheng Yun] Li Tongqie, sound cage. Mallard. [Ji Yun] Lu Dongqie, Xiao? Ye. [Rhyme Club] Lu Kongqie, sound cage. The same meaning.
